channel.title: Comical but serious suggestion on an unconfirmable Priest
channel.description: >**Resurrect (Night)** - If target player dies tonight, they will be able to participate in day chat **as yourself** (but the spam limit is not increased for your player number). >__________ >They will also be able to *invisibly* accuse and vote, meaning if their accusation or vote were to have no affect, nobody would be aware that your vote counted twice or anything abnormal. >____________ >At night, you will be able to chat freely with each other as separate entities.

item.title: Comical but serious suggestion on an unconfirmable Priest
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.source: Comical but serious suggestion on an unconfirmable Priest

item.title: Comical but serious suggestion on an unconfirmable Priest
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Nice avoiding the no dead interaction rule

you read my mind lol

Mind if I try to turn this into a full class?

yes please

Read full topic

item.title: Comical but serious suggestion on an unconfirmable Priest
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Shrimpy:

They will also be able to invisibly accuse and vote, meaning if their accusation or vote were to have no affect, nobody would be aware that your vote counted twice or anything abnormal.

What would people see when this actually matters?

Read full topic
item.source: Comical but serious suggestion on an unconfirmable Priest

item.title: Comical but serious suggestion on an unconfirmable Priest
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Resurrect (Night) - If target player dies tonight, they will be able to participate in day chat as yourself (but the spam limit is not increased for your player number).

They will also be able to invisibly accuse and vote, meaning if their accusation or vote were to have no affect, nobody would be aware that your vote counted twice or anything abnormal.

At night, you will be able to chat freely with each other as separate entities.

Read full topic
item.source: Comical but serious suggestion on an unconfirmable Priest
